languages.text: "Хм... Хм! Вы знаете, династия фон Валанциус действительно заключала контракт с владельцами судна, обозначенного как "Пылающее возмездие"! Вижу расчеты с казной, вижу записи о подъеме груза с Кьявы Гамма... странно, данные обрываются. Судя по всему, речь шла о некоем цехе на вашем индустриальном мире. Прошу меня простить, Ваша Светлость — это все, чем могу вам помочь".

"Hmm... Hmm! I say, House von Valancius did indeed sign a contract with the owners of a vessel with the designation Fiery Reckoning! There are transactions, records of the ship picking up cargo from Kiava Gamma... Well, this is odd. The data log ends there. Apparently, the ship had some interactions with one of the workshops on your industrial world. I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but that is the extent of the assistance I can provide you in regard to this particular matter."
languages.original_text: "Хм... Хм! Вы знаете, династия фон Валанциус действительно заключала контракт с владельцами судна, обозначенного как "Пылающее возмездие"! languages.text: “嗯……找到了！确实如此，冯·瓦兰修斯家族曾与某艘虚空舰的舰主签了合同，那艘船就叫‘烈焰之怒号’！我找到了交易记录，那艘船从基亚瓦伽马星取走了某件货物……嗯，这真的很奇怪。数据日志到此结束了，很显然，这艘飞船与您的王朝工业世界的某个车间打过交道。请原谅，大人，恐怕我能提供的线索只有这些。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm... Hmm! I say, House von Valancius did indeed sign a contract with the owners of a vessel with the designation Fiery Reckoning! There are transactions, records of the ship picking up cargo from Kiava Gamma... Well, this is odd. The data log ends there. Apparently, the ship had some interactions with one of the workshops on your industrial world. I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but that is the extent of the assistance I can provide you in regard to this particular matter."

traits.locale_text: “嗯……找到了！确实如此，冯·瓦兰修斯家族曾与某艘虚空舰的舰主签了合同，那艘船就叫‘烈焰之怒号’！我找到了交易记录，那艘船从基亚瓦伽马星取走了某件货物……嗯，这真的很奇怪。数据日志到此结束了，很显然，这艘飞船与您的王朝工业世界的某个车间打过交道。请原谅，大人，恐怕我能提供的线索只有这些。”

languages.text: « Hmm... Hmm ! Il semblerait que la maison von Valancius ait signé un contrat avec les détenteurs d'un vaisseau baptisé le Jugement Ardent ! J'ai ici des traces de plusieurs transactions et d'un transport de cargaison en provenance de Kiava Gamma... Mais ces données ne datent pas d'hier, et le registre s'arrête là. Tout ce que je peux vous dire de plus, c'est que le vaisseau aurait eu quelques interactions avec l'un des ateliers de votre monde industriel. Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie, mais c'est là toute l'assistance que je peux vous fournir à ce sujet. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm... Hmm! I say, House von Valancius did indeed sign a contract with the owners of a vessel with the designation Fiery Reckoning! There are transactions, records of the ship picking up cargo from Kiava Gamma... Well, this is odd. The data log ends there. Apparently, the ship had some interactions with one of the workshops on your industrial world. I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but that is the extent of the assistance I can provide you in regard to this particular matter."

J'ai ici des traces de plusieurs transactions et d'un transport de cargaison en provenance de Kiava Gamma... Mais ces données ne datent pas d'hier, et le registre s'arrête là. Tout ce que je peux vous dire de plus, c'est que le vaisseau aurait eu quelques interactions avec l'un des ateliers de votre monde industriel. Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie, mais c'est là toute l'assistance que je peux vous fournir à ce sujet. »

languages.text: «Mmm... ¡Vaya! ¡Sí, la casa von Valancius llegó a contratar a los propietarios de una nave designada Juicio Abrasador! Hay transacciones, el registro de la recogida de un cargamento en Kiava Gamma... qué curioso. El registro de datos termina aquí. Por lo que veo, la nave tuvo alguna interacción con uno de los talleres de su mundo industrial. Lo lamento, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero no tengo más información que proporcionarle en lo relacionado con este asunto».
languages.original_text: "Hmm... Hmm! I say, House von Valancius did indeed sign a contract with the owners of a vessel with the designation Fiery Reckoning! There are transactions, records of the ship picking up cargo from Kiava Gamma... Well, this is odd. The data log ends there. Apparently, the ship had some interactions with one of the workshops on your industrial world. I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but that is the extent of the assistance I can provide you in regard to this particular matter."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm... ¡Vaya! ¡Sí, la casa von Valancius llegó a contratar a los propietarios de una nave designada Juicio Abrasador! Hay transacciones, el registro de la recogida de un cargamento en Kiava Gamma... qué curioso. El registro de datos termina aquí. Por lo que veo, la nave tuvo alguna interacción con uno de los talleres de su mundo industrial. Lo lamento, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero no tengo más información que proporcionarle en lo relacionado con este asunto».

languages.text: 「ふむふむ…なるほど！フォン・ヴァランシウス家は、たしかに、という名の船の所有者と契約を交わしていたようです！取引の記録も、キアヴァ・ガンマから貨物を積み込んだ記録もあります…ですが、これは奇妙ですね。データログはそこで終わっています。どうやらこの船は、あなた様の産業惑星のひとつと関わりがあったようです。恐れ入りますが、陛下、この件について私から提供できるものはここまでです」
languages.original_text: "Hmm... Hmm! I say, House von Valancius did indeed sign a contract with the owners of a vessel with the designation Fiery Reckoning! There are transactions, records of the ship picking up cargo from Kiava Gamma... Well, this is odd. The data log ends there. Apparently, the ship had some interactions with one of the workshops on your industrial world. I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but that is the extent of the assistance I can provide you in regard to this particular matter."

traits.locale_text: 「ふむふむ…なるほど！フォン・ヴァランシウス家は、たしかに、<灼炎の罰>という名の船の所有者と契約を交わしていたようです！取引の記録も、キアヴァ・ガンマから貨物を積み込んだ記録もあります…ですが、これは奇妙ですね。データログはそこで終わっています。どうやらこの船は、あなたの産業惑星の1つと関わりがあったようです。恐れ入りますが、陛下、この件について私から提供できるものはここまでです」

languages.text: "Hmm ... Hmm! Das Haus Valancius hat tatsächlich einen Vertrag mit den Besitzern eines Schiffs mit der Kennung Fiery Reckoning abgeschlossen! Es gibt Transaktionen, Belege, dass das Schiff auf Kiava Gamma Fracht abgeholt hat ... Merkwürdig. Dort endet das Datenlog. Das Schiff hatte offenbar einige Interaktionen mit einer der Werkstätten auf Eurer Produktionswelt. Verzeiht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, doch ich kann Euch in dieser Angelegenheit nicht weiter behilflich sein."
languages.original_text: "Hmm... Hmm! I say, House von Valancius did indeed sign a contract with the owners of a vessel with the designation Fiery Reckoning! There are transactions, records of the ship picking up cargo from Kiava Gamma... Well, this is odd. The data log ends there. Apparently, the ship had some interactions with one of the workshops on your industrial world. I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but that is the extent of the assistance I can provide you in regard to this particular matter."

Verzeiht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, doch ich kann Euch in dieser Angelegenheit nicht weiter behilflich sein."

languages.text: "Hımm... Hımm! Von Valancius Hanesi, Kıyamet Kadırgası'na giden bir aracın sahipleriyle kontrat imzalamış! Birtakım ticari işlemler var, geminin Kiava Gama'dan kargo aldığı kayıtları tutulmuş. Çok tuhaf. Veri kaydı burada bitiyor. Belli ki gemi, sınai dünyanızdaki atölyelerden biriyle haşır neşir olmuş. Affedersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri lakin bu konu hakkında sağlayabileceğim destek bu kadar."
